column2: Papa Bear, this is Alpha Black. Tegy Farm is cleared and secured. Over.
Alpha Black to Papa Bear. Second objective, Blucher House, is under NATO control. Over.
Papa Bear, this is Alpha One. Papa Bear, we have Charlois pretty well cleaned up. Over.
Alpha Black calling HQ. We just cleared the fourth objective. The Reds in Hoorn are toast. Over.
Roger that, Alpha. Affirmative, we can see the fires burning with our own binoculars. Papa Bear out.
Understood, Alpha One. Good work. HQ out.
We copy you loud and clear, Alpha. U-2 Recon overflight confirms; Charlois is clear. Papa Bear out.
Alpha Black, we read you. Hoorn is NATO territory now. Nice work. HQ out.
Papa Bear to team Alpha. Welcome back. That was some baptism of fire. Mission complete. Out.
